+000017b0: 2323 2044 6570 656e 6465 6e63 6965 730a  ## Dependencies.
+000017c0: 0a41 6c6c 206f 6620 6061 7267 7561 626c  .All of `arguabl
+000017d0: 7960 2069 7320 6275 696c 7420 6f6e 2074  y` is built on t
+000017e0: 6f70 206f 6620 6061 7267 7061 7273 6560  op of `argparse`
+000017f0: 2e20 4974 2068 6173 2074 776f 2064 6570  . It has two dep
+00001800: 656e 6465 6e63 6965 733a 0a0a 2a20 6064  endencies:..* `d
+00001810: 6f63 7374 7269 6e67 2d70 6172 7365 7260  ocstring-parser`
+00001820: 2066 6f72 2070 6172 7369 6e67 2066 756e   for parsing fun
+00001830: 6374 696f 6e20 646f 6373 7472 696e 6773  ction docstrings
+00001840: 0a2a 2060 7479 7069 6e67 2d65 7874 656e  .* `typing-exten
+00001850: 7369 6f6e 7360 2066 6f72 2060 416e 6e6f  sions` for `Anno
+00001860: 7461 7465 645b 5d60 2073 7570 706f 7274  tated[]` support
+00001870: 2069 6e20 5079 7468 6f6e 2033 2e38 2028   in Python 3.8 (
+00001880: 6f6e 6c79 206e 6565 6465 6420 666f 7220  only needed for 
+00001890: 7468 6174 2076 6572 7369 6f6e 290a 0a23  that version)..#
